trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider"></xref>.
These identifiers are used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent fields in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.Column"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.ColumnSpan"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.ContainingGrid"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref> pattern.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.Row"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.RowSpan"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
